#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
#include<stack>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<queue>
#include<set>
#include<list>
#define pb(x) push_back(x);
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc(x) putchar_unlocked(x);
#define inf 1<<30
#define mod 1000000007

using namespace std;

typedef pair<int,int> pii;

long long int abso(long long int a,long long int b)
{
	if(a<b)
		return b-a;
	else
		return a-b;
}

long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
	if(a<b)
		swap(a,b);
	long long int r;
	while(b!=0)
	{
		r=a;
		a=b;
		b=r%b;
	}
	return a;
}

int prime[1000005],num[1000005];

void sieve()
{
	prime[0]=1;
	prime[1]=1;
	num[0]=num[1]=0;
	for(int i=2;i<=1000000;i++)
	{
		if(prime[i]==0)
		{
			num[i]=num[i-1]+1;
			int j=2;
			while(j*i<=1000000)
			{
				prime[j*i]=1;
				j++;
			}
		}
		else
			num[i]=num[i-1];
	}
}

int main()
{
	int t,n,a,b,ans;
	cin>>t;
	sieve();
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a>>b;
		ans=num[b]-num[a];
		if(prime[a]==0)
			ans++;
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
